description: This file defines an interface class IOmiProxy for interacting with an omi_dbus_api, providing methods for mounting/unmounting crypted bundles and managing error listeners. It includes documentation comments and a namespace omi.
external_methods: virtual bool mountCryptedBundle(const std::string&, const std::string&, const std::string&, std::string&)
virtual long unsigned registerListener(const OmiErrorListener&, const void*)

classes.name: omi::IOmiProxy
classes.description: Interface class providing methods to interact with omi_dbus_api, including mounting/unmounting crypted bundles and managing error listeners.

methods.name: mountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Mounts a crypted bundle given its ID, filesystem image path, and config JSON path. Outputs the decrypted bundle path.

methods.name: umountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Unmounts a crypted bundle specified by its ID.

methods.name: registerListener
methods.description: Registers an error listener callback and returns a listener ID.

methods.name: unregisterListener
methods.description: Unregisters a previously registered error listener by its ID.

ctags.name: OmiErrorListener
ctags.pattern: /^    typedef std::function<void(const std::string&, ErrorType, const void*)> OmiErrorListener;$/
